content: this is a sleeveless mesh hoodie made sideways the design comes in five sizes all contained in a colour coordinated pattern large chest 104 cm length 71 cm - 100g x 4 yarn xl chest 112 cm length 76 cm - 100g x 4 yarn xxl chest 120 cm length 81 cm - 100g x 5 yarn xxxl chest 134 cm length 84 cm - 100g x 5 yarn xxxxl chest 144 cm length 87 cm - 100g x 6 yarn this pattern is intermediate
